newsitem.title: PORTUGAL: EDP shr price higher in 2nd stage selloff.
newsitem.headline: EDP shr price higher in 2nd stage selloff.

text.p: The share price in the second stage privatisation of utility EDP-Electricidade de Portugal will be substantially higher than in the first stage next month, reflecting expectations of improved results, EDP president Antonio de Almeida said.

"With the prospect of an improvement in EDP's results, I expect that in the second stage privatisation the sale will take place at a much higher price," Almeida told reporters at the start of a roadshow to promote the privatisation of an expected 27.5 percent stake in EDP in June.
"The state will bring in a substantially larger sum (in the second stage)," he added.
The first stage sell-off will take place at a special session on Lisbon bourse on June 16. Pre-registration for EDP shares opened on Monday.
The government has not yet revealed its plans for a second stage privatisation of EDP.
